name: IISA Corps
uniques: [-20]% Strength bonus for [Enemy] units within [1] tiles
Only available <in cities with a [Internal Isnisian Security Administration]>

civilopediaText.text: The empire's feared police force, few in number yet extremely powerful on the battlefield. This unit's mere presence puts fear deep into the hearts of those bearing the misfortune of encountering it on the frontline.

name: InCC-22
uniques: [-35]% Strength <when fighting in [Rough terrain] tiles> <when defending>

civilopediaText.text: The InCC-22 was the empire's answer to the large amounts of infantry its enemies possesed. Its light armor and efficient machine guns destroying any infantry divisions it faces with relative ease. It faced significant difficulty on rough terrain however, with its mechanisms not suited to rough and bumpy terrain.

The InLA-40 is the empire's powerful heavy tank. It boldly drives into battle with its shiny steel hull, almost impenetrable. Its prowess on the battlefield almost unmatched for 40 years before finally being outperformed by modern technology. Yet it still saw some use in modern campaigns.
The CAIsN-12 is the empire's CAS, designed to frequently carry out airstrikes on enemy positions, while still being able to enforce air superiority in a more limited fashion.
